basics.name: Yash Ganatra
basics.label: Mechanical Engineer
basics.summary: Yash is a persevering mechanical engineer who loves programing and enjoys playing with the greatest and latest. He has experience in product development, mechanical design, heat transfer and CFD

work.summary: Leads product development to make thermocouple based temperature measurement systems for high temperatures (2000-3000Â°F)
highlights: Develop product technical specifications from customer and sales team feedback
Test and troubleshoot prototypes to recommend design improvements
Define and oversee execution of performance validation tests
Qualify  vendors and enable customer success

work.summary: (Masters Thesis) Feasibility study of cooling smartphones using Phase Change Materials (PCMs)
highlights: Demonstrated that PCMs signifcantly lower max processor temperatures (1.5-3x)
Setup hardware thermal testing and develop heat transfer simulations in COMSOL and ANSYS
Publish and present technical reports, presentations and research papers
Analyzed critical parameters and optimize design

work.company: Designed and built a car for BAJA SAE India competition
work.summary: (Undergrad project) Wear multiple hats to build an off road vehicle
highlights: Setup the first collegiate to participate in BAJA SAE India
Tranmission system design in SoldiWorks CAD
Static and dymnamic FEA analysis in SolidWorks Simulation and verification with empirical calculations
Mentored incoming team members, coordinate logisitics and fundraising

work.company: Heat Transfer Simulation of Phase Change in MATLAB & ANSYS FLUENT
work.summary: Developed customizable and robust phase change CFD simulation model
highlights: Continually expand knowledge of CAE (FEA/CFD) and CAD in ANSYS and SolidWorks
Expand model capability by writing C program scripts (UDF) in ANSYS FLUENT
Developed 2D CFD solver from first principles in MATLAB

volunteer.summary: Make learning fun and more relatable
highlights: Facilitate better understanding of energy conversion through hands on experiments and examples

publications.name: Experimental investigation of Phase Change Materials for thermal management of handheld devices
publications.summary: Hardware thermal testing to quantify usefulness of PCMs in cooling smartphones.

publications.name: Experimental Evaluation of Thermal Resistances of Phase Change Materials
publications.summary: Characterize thermal resistance of PCMs using IR camera and reference bar method (ASTM D5470 standard)
